SettingsPage_OptimizePreviews_Descriptio: I-optimize ang mga larawan ng preview ng mod para sa mas mahusay na pagganap
ImageOptimizer_JpegQuality_Description: Mas mataas na kalidad = mas malaking laki ng file
ImageOptimizer_ThreadCount_Description: Mas maraming thread = mas mabilis na pagproseso (nakita ang {0} logical cores)
ImageOptimizer_CreateBackups: Gumawa ng mga backup bago mag-optimize
ImageOptimizer_CreateBackups_Description: Sine-save ang mga orihinal bilang preview-bk-001.jpg, preview-bk-002.jpg, atbp.
ImageOptimizer_KeepOriginals: Panatilihin ang mga orihinal na file pagkatapos mag-optimize
ImageOptimizer_KeepOriginals_Description: Ang mga orihinal na file ay hindi tatanggalin (hal. ang preview.png ay mananatili kasama ng preview.jpg)
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Rename: Palitan lang ang pangalan ng mga file
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Full_Description: Resize to 1000x1000, crop to square, convert to JPEG, generate miniatures. Respects backup and keep originals settings.
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Miniatures_Descripti: Only generate miniature thumbnails (minitile.jpg 600x722, catmini.jpg 600x600) without modifying original files
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Rename_Description: Rename files to standard names (preview.jpg, preview-01.jpg, etc.) without optimization
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Lite_Description: Convert to JPEG with compression, generate miniatures, no resizing or cropping. Respects backup and keep originals settings.
ImageOptimizer_Mode_Disabled_Description: No optimization - just copy files with standard names
OptimizePreviews_Completed: Matagumpay na nakumpleto ang pag-optimize ng preview
